hook.text: IUI places sperm directly into the uterus, shortening their journey and boosting conception chances.

buildup.text: Sperm are washed and concentrated in a lab, then inserted through a thin catheter during ovulation.

discovery.text: IUI is less invasive and cheaper than IVF, making it a common first-line fertility treatment.

twist.text: Success rates per cycle are modest, around 10 to 20%, so multiple attempts are often needed.

climax.text: IUI works best for mild male factor, cervical issues, or when using donor sperm.

punchline.text: A simpler assist before the bigger step of IVF.

quiz.question: What is the typical success rate of IUI per cycle?
